value:
$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Kvasir is nowhere to be found...
She must have only wanted us to
think she was headed to the castle.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Another intruder... Has all respect
for the king of the vanir been lost?!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Smile|King Njörðr!$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Who are you? I would know who
it is I am to mete out punishment
to for such flagrant disrespect.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, right... I haven't come into
King Njörðr's service yet...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Then this is the castle of a king
of gods...and we're intruding?!$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Guards! Seize them! Bring them
before me so I may deliver the
proper justice upon them.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Gullveig's forces lie ahead...
And Njörðr's close in behind us.
We have to hurry!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|I will see my mission through
to completion.$k$pNow that I've traveled here and
changed Njörðr's future, I must—$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Kvasir!$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|So. You followed me.$k$p$EFace_Smile|As much as I enjoyed our time
together, $Nu...$k$pDespite the fact that I would hold
on to that time we spent together
forever if I could...$k$p$EFace_Pain|I am Gullveig—and time is cruel,
moving relentlessly forward.$k$pThere will come a day when
I will kill you.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|That is when Gullveig will unwind
the time bound up in her flesh and
be drawn renewed into the world.$k$pShe will become me, Kvasir, and
the cycle will continue. On and on.
An inescapable, never-ending loop.$k$pThis is...the Golden Seer's curse.$k$p$Sbs150|
